name: This Network
description: Current/local/this network - used for source only
notes: Addresses refer to source hosts on this network

name: This Host on This Network
description: May be used as source address for host on this network
notes: Single host identifier for unspecified source

name: Private-Use Class A
description: Private network space - Class A equivalent

name: Loopback
notes: All addresses in block reserved for loopback

name: Cloud Metadata Service
notes: CRITICAL: Often MONITORED not excluded - IMDS abuse detection

name: Private-Use Class B
description: Private network space - Class B equivalent

name: IPv4 Service Continuity Prefix
notes: Non-routed IPv4 for IPv6 transition solutions

name: IPv4 Dummy Address
description: IPv4 dummy address for IPv6 transition

name: 6to4 Relay Anycast (Deprecated)
notes: DEPRECATED - was IPv6 to IPv4 relay

name: Private-Use Class C
description: Private network space - Class C equivalent
notes: 65K addresses - most common home network range

name: Direct Delegation AS112 Service
notes: DNS anycast for private reverse zones

name: SSDP
notes: UPnP device discovery - common Windows traffic
